attributes.action: Consider encouraging couples to marry instead of being partners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Couples would be less inclined to separate,  If they were Married and not just partnered. This could be achieved by giving all married couples a monthly cash payment, provided they continued to live together. Couples that are partnered and not married at present, would receive from the government a cash payment to offset the cost of getting married.
attributes.creator_name: Mr Joseph Robert Neil James & Mrs Margaret James.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
